title: How to Find Free ATMs for Your Cash Card

steps.title: You can withdraw Cash App funds for free at most commercial banks in the US.
steps.content: You can withdraw Cash App funds for free at most commercial banks in the US. Cash Card users can avoid ATM fees at an ATM located in any US commercial bank that has consolidated assets of at least $300 million. This includes major banks like Chase, Bank of America, Wells Fargo, and US Bank. To see a list of all qualifying banks, visit https://www.federalreserve.gov/releases/lbr/current .

steps.title: Seek in-network ATMs.
steps.content: Seek in-network ATMs. In addition to banks, large ATM networks like Allpoint and PULSE guarantee a surcharge-free experience for all Cash Card owners. These ATMs tend to be located at gas stations or convenience stores . Use this tool to find an Allpoint ATM near you. Use this tool to find a PULSE ATM near you.

steps.title: Remember:
steps.content: Remember: Cash App still charges a $2.50 transaction fee for withdrawals. While the ATMs we've listed won't charge an additional fee, you'll still have to pay this fee to Cash App. The exception is if you receive at least $300 per month in direct deposit funds , such as from your paycheck.

steps.title: Use the Cash App ATM finder.
steps.content: Use the Cash App ATM finder. To find the nearest fee-free ATM, tap the Cash Card tab within Cash App and select Find an ATM . Use the onscreen map to find an in-network ATM near you or enter an address to find one elsewhere. Tap the icon for the ATM on the map to see its details, including hours and address. Press and hold the address to open it in your navigation app. You may need to grant Cash App location permission if you have not already.
